body_html:
Windows 10.
New installation of Anaconda.

import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
File "C:\Users<user name>\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\torch_init_.py", line 76, in
from torch._C import *
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.

Any ideas?
thanks!

body:
Windows 10.
New installation of Anaconda.

import torch
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "C:\Users\<user name>\AppData\Local\Continuum\anaconda3\lib\site-packages\torch\__init__.py", line 76, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found.

Any ideas?
thanks!
